titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate the Nulhegan River and Paul Stream in the State of Vermont for potential addition to the national wild and scenic rivers system, and for other purposes.
Nulhegan River and Paul Stream Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2025
Nulhegan River and Paul Stream Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2025

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
